mapper.insert: insert into activity (id, activityid, activityname, activitysdate, activityedate, activityaddr, Latitude, longitude, activityimg, createtime, state, activityprice, activityidcontent) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activitysdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityedate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{activityidcontent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update activity
activityid = #{activityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
activityname = #{activityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select: select * from activity where 1=1 and activityname = #{activity.activityname} order by createtime desc
